short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Increase your depression by seeing your student debt each time you open a new tab!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Some people treat college like a joke - they waste their time doing meaningless things and aren't aware how much they or their family are paying for them to just be at college.  Well worry no more, because with this extension, you can see your student debt increase with every second you open a new tab!
